column4: i have tried to install ubuntu but in the end... i have 4partitions. in one (the swap) i choose swap. in ext3 i choose "/" (the root). right? but the 1st partition is the windows partition.  what option can i choose? and the 2nd partition is swap and ext3 toghether. what can i choose?
